subject: RE: [junit] Help needed in generating the test report
msgSnippet: Thanx...the link was of tremendous help Gauri ... The easiest way to get nice looking test reports is to run your tests from ant.  See question 6.6 in the
messageBody:
Thanx...the link was of tremendous help

Gauri


--- "Bradley, Todd" <todd.bradley@...> wrote:


---------------------------------
The easiest way to get nice looking test reports
is to run your tests from ant. See question 6.6
in the JUnit FAQ:

http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/faq/faq.htm#running_6

need to

generated but
